text: lys ela ahl al'aedhar min aldueafa' walmrda walfqra' aldhyn la yamlikun min almal ma ytjhzwn bih lilkhuruj 'iithm fi alqewd 'iidha akhlsu lilah wrswlh, waeamiluu bshreh, ma ealaa man 'ahsan mmn maneih aledhr ean aljhad mae rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm, wahu nasih lilah walirasulih min tariq yeaqb min qibalih wywakhdh elyh. wallah ghafur llmhsnyn, rahim bhm
